alert.note: Alert for Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 3:37PM CST until November 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle. Additional ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 12 and 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Oliver County. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until Midnight CST tonight. For the Winter Storm Warning, from Midnight tonight to Midnight CST Thursday Night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
